name: 計画停電速報
summary:
『計画停電速報』は、計画停電対象地域から計画停電グループと計画停電スケジュールを東京電力のデータを活用してチェックできるアプリ。また、スマートフォンの位置情報を利用して現在地の停電情報を調べることもできる。
--
You can get the Rolling blackout infomation at one view.
"Preliminary rolling blackouts" in the group with load shedding load shedding schedule from the target area blackouts,
You can check the data to take advantage of the Electric Power Company. View the schedule of load shedding over one week
The.
The outage information can also check the current location using the location information to the smart phone.
Related application that calls for saving electricity usage in the area from Toukyoudenryoku
"Everybody's saving index"
Conjunction with power-saving information can be shared.
Rolling blackouts and load shedding schedule for the group can share and Twitter MIXI.
info:
